display_long_description:
YOUR BODY IS THE ULTIMATE WEAPON. Forget buttons. In Squatopia, every movement you make unleashes destruction. You are a living artillery unit fighting off waves of enemies in a procedurally generated bullet hell.

[media]

💥 PROJECTILE COMBAT EVOLVED Your exercises are your ammunition.

Charge & Fire: Perform squats and lunges to launch powerful energy projectiles from your body. The deeper you move, the harder you hit.

Parry & Deflect: You have no shield. Use your fists to swat away incoming fireballs, spiderwebs, and high-speed bats in tactile, physics-based defense.

Dodge the Chaos: Weave your head and body through complex patterns of lasers and enemy fire.

🌍 BATTLE ANYWHERE

Virtual Worlds: Fight in stylized, open-air environments against enemies that hover and strike from a distance.

Mixed Reality (MR): Transform your actual living room into the arena. Watch enemies spawn from your walls while you fight safely in your own space.

♾️ INFINITE LOADOUTS Combine 25+ unique firing styles with randomized power-ups to create billions of build combinations. Create a rapid-fire build, a heavy-artillery build, or a defensive tank build—all powered by your own sweat.

🔥 FREE TO PLAY FOREVER The core arena experience is 100% free. No trials. No subscriptions. Jump in and start blasting.

Are you ready to open fire? Download Squatopia and dominate the arena.
